signals.problem_statement: The current email management solution using Outlook and Jira does not facilitate effective collaboration and communication.
signals.customer_ask: Looking for a solution that integrates email management and collaboration.
signals.suggested_solution: A unified platform that combines email management and collaboration features.
signals.context: Team of 15 managing investor relations communications.

signals.problem_statement: Lack of visibility into ongoing email conversations leads to missed information when team members are unavailable.
signals.customer_ask: Need a solution that provides visibility into all email communications.
signals.suggested_solution: A system that allows team members to see all email threads and conversations.
signals.context: Team of 15 managing investor relations communications.

signals.problem_statement: The current system does not allow for automated prioritization of incoming requests based on their urgency.
signals.customer_ask: Interested in AI functionality to prioritize requests automatically.
signals.suggested_solution: Implementing AI to assess and prioritize incoming emails based on urgency.
signals.context: Team of 15 managing investor relations communications.
